abstract:
The Africa Colloquium of Legal Counsel to Parliaments is an event which brings togetherLegal Counsel serving in Parliaments in Africa at both the national and sub-national levels.
We are privileged to have been invited to participate in this august Colloquium to share our experience as legal Counsel serving in Benins Parliament.
title: The Role of Legal Counsel Serving in Parliaments - Country Experience
subject: law
